title: radialgauge ValueChanged
body: The RadialGauge control needs a ValueChanged event to enable apps to tie to it and become more event-driven.

comments.body: So now we're at the end of May 2019 but still, this is not implemented
I had put in a pull request to add this to the control, but the developers of the kit decided to wait a bit longer to change the class structure of the control instead.
